highlights: Examining sequence determinants of function for a bacterial multidrug efflux pump using high-throughput techniques. Two first-author publications (see “Publications”).
Designing and screening metagenomic libraries for biofuel-relevant efflux pumps to facilitate bioenergy strain engineering. Co-author publication in preparation.
Understanding evolution of allostery in TetR-family repressors using ancestral sequence reconstruction and high-throughput screening. Co-first author publication in preparation.
